meanings.meaning: being sent to live in another country

examples: Many spent decades in labour camps or in internal exile.
The king went into exile after the overthrow of his government.
They joined the many other Armenians living in exile.
He still hopes to return from exile one day.
She had spent 40 years in exile.
Dante died in exile from Florence.

meanings.meaning: person forced to live in another country

examples: A general amnesty was granted, allowing political exiles to return freely.
